activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12377
activity.text:
Hi team,
I’d like to take up this issue as part of my GDC AI Internship, to add support for rescheduling existing care slots to another doctor or nurse within the facility.
I have reviewed the feature requirements and believe I can implement this with proper validation to ensure seamless reassignment while maintaining data integrity.
Based on initial assessment, I estimate about 2 to 4 days to deliver a robust solution including testing.
Looking forward to contributing!

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12409

Thank you!
